summary: Lead Designer with experience optimizing complex processes and providing steel framing solutions for residential and commercial applications. Strong technical, analytical and communication skills with 4 years of CAD drafting and engineering experience.

experience.title: Lead Designer
experience.description: Managed multiple projects simultaneously within budgetary restrictions. Designed carts, frames, doors, panels, enclosures and brackets using Inventor and AutoCAD. Created mobile and modular custom container structures for storage, offices and mobile labs. Collaborated with engineers and project managers on design parameters; produced sketches and CAD tasks to meet client specifications and deadlines.

experience.title: AutoCAD Engineer
experience.description: Independently developed new and existing products including commercial and residential framework design. Created engineering and shop drawings for roofs, floors, wall panels and trusses; worked with architects and contractors; prepared CAD work samples; built study and presentation models.

experience.title: Project Engineer
experience.description: Contributed to a $35 Million facility expansion; performed CAD-based facility layout planning; created a team project journal; conducted time studies, cost analysis, Pareto analysis, and simulations.

experience.title: Construction Aide
experience.description: Designed plan for leadership conference; developed budget and sponsorship packages; used Adobe Photoshop for conference logo; tested and monitored product safety, contributing to safer electronic communications products.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Industrial Engineering
